mapper.sql: id, name, state, postal_address, email_address, mobile_phone, password, currency, user_type, version
p.id, p.name, p.state, p.postal_address, p.email_address, p.mobile_phone, p.password, p.currency, p.user_type, p.version

p.id AS p_id, p.name AS p_name, p.state AS p_state, p.postal_address AS p_postal_address, p.email_address AS p_email_address, p.mobile_phone AS p_mobile_phone, p.password AS p_password, p.currency AS p_currency, p.user_type AS p_user_type, cp.abbreviation AS cp_abbreviation, cp.channel_name AS cp_channel_name, cp.commission AS cp_commission, cp.funds_holder AS cp_funds_holder, pm.funds_holder AS pm_funds_holder, pm.payment_amount AS pm_payment_amount, pm.payment_type AS pm_payment_type, pm.commission AS pm_commission, mtc.id AS mtc_id, mtc.property_manager_id AS mtc_property_manager_id, mtc.channel_partner_id AS mtc_channel_partner_id, mtc.channel_partner_commission AS mtc_channel_partner_commission, mtc.funds_holder AS mtc_funds_holder, mtc.net_rate AS mtc_net_rate
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM party p LEFT JOIN channel_partner cp on p.id = cp.party_id LEFT JOIN property_manager_info pm on p.id = pm.pm_id LEFT JOIN manager_to_channel mtc ON mtc.channel_partner_id = cp.id OR mtc.property_manager_id = pm.id WHERE p.id = #{id} AND (cp.state IS NULL OR cp.state = 'Created') AND (pm.state IS NULL OR pm.state = 'Created')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party(name, state, postal_address, email_address, mobile_phone, password, currency, user_type) VALUES (#{name}, #{state}, #{postalAddress}, #{emailAddress}, #{mobilePhone}, #{password}, #{currency}, #{userType})
